issues.description: The `Person` entity in the template declares its `id` field as `java.util.UUID`, but the `PersonRepository` (and the REST controllers and tests) are parameterized with and expect a `Long` identifier. This mismatch prevents compilation and makes it impossible for students to implement or run the provided tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of the `id` field in `Person.java` from `java.util.UUID` to `Long` so that it matches the generic type parameter of `JpaRepository<Person, Long>` and the `Long personId` parameters used in controllers and tests.

issues.description: The problem statement refers to the REST endpoints with an "/api" prefix (e.g. PUT /api/persons/{personId}/parents), but both the template and solution code define those mappings at "/persons/..." (no "/api"). This mismatch will confuse students when invoking or testing the API.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the path prefix by updating the code: add path="/api" to the class-level @RequestMapping in PersonResource (e.g. @RequestMapping(path = "/api", consumes = ..., produces = ...)) so that all endpoints match the "/api/persons/..." usage in the problem statement.
